alert.note: Alert for Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 8:18PM CDT until April 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MILAM AND SOUTHEASTERN BELL COUNTIES... At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rogers, or 11 miles southeast of Temple, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Temple, Little River-Academy, Rogers, Holland, Buckholts, Sparks, Yarrelton, Leedale, Edgeworth, Cyclone, Heidenheimer, Pettibone, Davilla, Val Verde, Seaton, Red Ranger, Oscar and Zabcikville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Texas.
